nodes.text: Mutotech Labs was a laboratory located in the Duros Sector of Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War, a proxy conflict between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Hunt for the Eagle in 3643 BBY an Imperial Intelligence operative Cipher Nine assaulted the place, killing the guards and obtaining a sample of Cyclone stimulant used by the soldiers of the Eagle's network.
Mutotech Labs appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Imperial Agent class mission on Nar Shaddaa.
